title: inda vIDunran
sahitya:
inda vIDunran sonda vIDallavO En varat-tAmadam ayyA


anupallavi

  kandanE karaiyilAk-karuNai niraiyE vandanai sheidEn vazhi pArttu ninrEn


caraNam    unai ninaindEngiyE ughutta kaNNIrilATTi ulaginbam tunbam ennum OivilAk-kOlam tITTi 
nani mighum kAdalAm narccuDarETrinEn nAyakA ezhundaruL nAninit-tAzhEnE
